content:
John B said
Is there a way to have all of the folders in all accounts collapsed upon restart every time? There is no "Collapse All" option on a right-click of a folder which has been suggested. Deleting folderTree.json and session.json only opens with the configuration that it most recently closed with. I just started using Betterbird, version 128.13.0esr-bb31. Apologies. Just learned Betterbird is not Mozilla. Still...
creator: jimmyleg66

content:
It is your ISP's server causiing the rejection; TB is only the messenger. Try this:

Go to TB menu > Settings > General

- scroll all the way down and click the 'Config editor' button on the right

- click 'Accept the risk and continue'

- search for mailnews.tcptimeout > change the value to 200

Make sure to click the check mark making the change.
creator: siffemoz

content: That is a bug which hasn't made it to the release version yet. As a workaround, try going to TB menu > Account Settings > click your account on the left > click the 'Set as Default' button on the right.
creator: siffemoz
